title: He created Grand Theft Auto. Now he's back with a novel about an AI that hijacks your mind
description: A Better Paradise is a dystopian vision of the near future in which an AI-led computer game goes rogue.
content:
Dan Houser was one of the masterminds behind revolutionary video game series Grand Theft Auto.
Now, after leaving Rockstar Games and launching his own company, he's released a debut novel about a very different type of game.
A Better Paradise is a dy... [5483 chars]

title: Everyone is invited to be the fourth Haim sister
description: As they celebrate an historic Grammy nomination, Haim say everyone is welcome to join their band.
content:
"When are you interviewing Haim?" my sister Emily texts, late one night. "I wanted you to ask if I can be their fourth member."
There's just one problem: I also want to be Haim's fourth member. And we're not alone. Taylor Swift and actress Brie Larso... [7084 chars]

title: 'It felt like something on television, only this time it was our son'

title: Hospitals bring back face masks as flu cases rise in Dorset
description: HOSPITALS have reintroduced face masks and testing at the door as flu cases rise in Dorset.
content:
Following a national increase in a new strain of flu, University Hospitals Dorset has brought face masks back into its assessment areas, including A&E.
